## BEGIN_INCLUDE

== Storage Snapshots ==

''Snapshots'' allows you to create filesystem snapshots, and rollback the system to a previous snapshot.

 * Note: This feature requires a Btrfs filesystem. All of the !FreedomBox stable disk images use Btrfs.
